subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: John Salmons scored 22 points and hit two late 3-pointers, and the Chicago Bulls pulled out a wild 112-106 victory over the visiting Indiana Pacers for their fourth consecutive victory. Ben Gordon added 25 points as the Bulls matched their longest win streak in two years.
